page.shortlink: api objects security object is user in roles method
page.description: Checks to see if the user is in at least one of supplied roles.
page.prototype: Context.Security.IsUserInRoles as L (UserName as C, RoleNames as C)

argument.name: RoleNames
argument.description: The name of the roles. The role names are separated by a crlf.

return.name: result
return.description: Returns .T. if the user is in at least one of the specified roles; otherwise .F.

page.discussion: Context.Security.IsUserInRoles() checks to see if the user is in at least one of supplied roles. Check *[link:Context.Security.CallResult.Success@./index.xml#section1_CallResult]* before using the return value.
